name: Family Chess
description:
The game of Chess in a neat fantasy-esque package. Discover a more lively version of the most popular board game in the world.

Choose your favorite hero, pick your chessboard, and challenge yourself in this family-friendly version of Chess. Fall in love with the cartoony aesthetic, and make your first move in this fantastic game.

WHAT DO WE OFFER?

- A user-friendly interface that enables multiple players to take turns. You can play on a single device, passing it back and forth.

- Family Chess is designed for players of all ages, making it an ideal choice for family game nights.

- A chess engine that offers different difficulty levels, ranging from beginner to expert, ensuring that players of all skill levels can enjoy their games.

- A classic and cartoonish aesthetic with extra attention to detail and freedom of choice.

- An invigorating fantasy-esque music track designed to keep your focus on the challenge ahead.

- The game is playable in over 13 languages with a fully translated UI
